channel.title: Consulting on bdna
channel.description: Recent content in Consulting on bdna

item.title: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Education toward Employment Scheme
item.description: Close the gap and help indigenous students complete year 12 and progress to employment or further education.

item.title: Gold Coast ieMR
item.description: Gold Coast Hospital and Health Service were early adopters of a medical record solution and recently joined with the state-wide integrated electronic Medical Record solution.

item.title: PHN NT Digital Transformation
item.description: PHN NT engaged Bdna due to our experience in partnering to deliver upgrades to the indigenous education to employment scheme and our extensive experience in digital transformation.

item.title: Project Atlas
item.description: Bdna’s ability to deliver large and complex business and system transitions led to Tasmania Police engaging us to implement the NicheRMS™ solution.

item.title: Change Futures
item.description: Bdna conducted a review of the Change Futures ICT environment providing a list of recommendations to efficiently prepare Change Futures for their expansion.

item.title: G20 Security Operation
item.description: The Queensland Police Service (QPS) engaged bdna to assist with delivering local security for Australia’s largest peacetime security operation.

item.title: Metro North Digital Readiness
item.description: Bdna was selected as the digital readiness consulting firm to conduct a robust business, technical and financial readiness assessment in preparation for the implementation of the ieMR.

item.title: Police Contact Management Strategy
item.description: Bdna conducted a rapid review across the police service with a proposed model currently being implemented.

item.title: Aga Khan University Hospital
item.description: The Aga Khan University and Hospitals called upon bdna to provide an external review of the proposed delivery budget and delivery program for the implementation of an Electronic Health Record (EHR) in its hospitals.
